title: Iron Cook
description: Chefs prepare dishes with a mystery ingredient for a panel of celebrity judges, competing for the title of Iron Cook.
quote: The challenger’s ugly food has shown us that even hideous things can be sweet on the inside.
altHero: Chairman Koji stands before the obscured mystery ingredient
alt1: Bender and Elzar grab blocks of Soylent Green
alt2: Elzar uses spice weasel to add to his dish
alt3: Bender serves a dish to Bubblegum Tate, Morbo, and Martha Stewart’s head
alt4: Chairman Koji stands with Bender and Elzar
